channel.title: Error in my progressreport....help me please

item.title: Error in my progressreport....help me please
item.dc:creator: @martijntjuh martijntjuh
item.description:
@martijntjuh wrote:

ok thank you i’'ll try it out right now.

whahahaha it did 1 load and sayd it did 33 laods and 891 ores…hehe[br][size=1]Posted at: September 14, 2006, 01:22:20 AM[/size][hr]ow i understand the error its everytime it click it says 1 load and 27 ores:P

done thank you Ron!

[code]// MARTIJNTJUHS powerminer!!!
// 4th script!//
//special thanks to RON!!!for helping me with porgress report//

{.include srl\srl.scar}
{.include srl\srl\skill\mining.scar}

Const
RockColor = 6461160; // Color of the rock you wanna mine…
LoadsToDo = 10000; // Loads to mine and drop hehehe.

Var
Loads, Ores : Integer;

Procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers := 2; // Set Number of Players here.
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers); // Sets the Players Array Length;
CurrentPlayer := 0; // CurrentPlayer = Array Index

Players[0].Name := ‘scheeraap’; // Username
Players[0].Pass := ‘mafkees’; // Password
Players[0].Nick := ‘eer’; // 3 or 4 letters username
Players[0].Loc := ‘’; //Leave as blank
Players[0].Skill := ‘mining’; //The skill for when you get a lamp
Players[0].Active := True;

Players[0].Name := ‘lalalala’; // Username
Players[0].Pass := ‘dfhgh’; // Password
Players[0].Nick := ‘ala’; // 3 or 4 letters username
Players[0].Loc := ‘’; // Leave as blank
Players[0].Skill := ‘mining’; // The skill for when you get a lamp
Players[0].Active := True;

WriteLn(IntToStr(HowManyPlayers) + ’ Players’);
end;

Procedure PowerMiners2;
Var
x, y, prevcount, a : Integer;
begin
PrevCount := InvCount;
if FindObj(x, y, ‘ine’, RockColor, 10) then
begin
Mouse(x, y, 10, 5, True);
a := 0;
Repeat
Wait(1000);
a := a + 1;
if (a = 3) then break;
Until(InvFull)
if(invfull=true)then
Loads := Loads + 1;
Ores := Ores + 27;
end;
end;

Procedure FFight;
Var
b, a : integer;
begin
if (FindFight) then
begin
Writeln(‘Found Fight’);
RunAwayDirection(‘N’);
Writeln(‘running away!’);
Wait(8000 + random(3000));
RunBack;
end;
FindPick;
FindGas(a, b);
if (FindNewBox) then
begin
OpenBox;
Wait(1000);
GambleNewBox;
Wait(1000);
end;
if (FindNewBox) then
begin
OpenBox;
Wait(1000);
GambleNewBox;
end;
if (FindNewBox) then
begin
LogOut;
Writeln(‘Unable To Solve Box…Terminating’);
TerminateScript;
end;
end;

Procedure DropOre;
begin
MouseSpeed:= 13+Random(7);
DropTo(2, 14);
DropTo(15, 28);
end;

Procedure ProgressReport;
begin
ClearDebug;
WriteLn(‘Progress Report for MARTIJNTJUHS Powerminer Miner’);
WriteLn(’ ‘);
WriteLn(‘Mined and Dropped ’ + IntToStr(Loads) + ’ Loads.’);
WriteLn(’ ');
WriteLn(‘Mined and Dropped ’ + IntToStr(Ores) + ’ Ores.’);
end;

begin
SetupSRL;
SetupSRLMining;
FindPickHeadColor;
SetRun(True);
Repeat
FindNormalRandoms;
FFight;
PowerMiners2;
if(InvFull)then
begin
DropOre;
ProgressReport;
end;
Until(Loads = LoadsToDo)
WriteLn(‘Made by MARTIJNTJUH’)
end.[/code]

item.source: Error in my progressreport....help me please

item.title: Error in my progressreport....help me please
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Now try it. Your mistake was that you had declared Load and Ores as a variable inside the procedure which is bad, and you had it declared as a Global Vars. I removed the Load and Ores declared in the procedure, and it should work. It needs to be in the Global Vars to actually be able to count up otherwise it’s reset each time the procedure is called. Hope it works. 

// MARTIJNTJUHS powerminer!!!
// 4th script!

{.include srl\srl.scar}
{.include srl\srl\skill\mining.scar}

Const
  RockColor = 6461160;  // Color of the rock you wanna mine...
  LoadsToDo = 10000;    // Loads to mine and drop hehehe.

Var
  Loads, Ores : Integer;

Procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
  HowManyPlayers := 2; // Set Number of Players here.
  NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers); // Sets the Players Array Length;
  CurrentPlayer := 0; // CurrentPlayer = Array Index

  Players[0].Name := 'scheeraap'; // Username
  Players[0].Pass := 'mafkees';   // Password
  Players[0].Nick := 'eer';       // 3 or 4 letters username
  Players[0].Loc := '';           //Leave as blank
  Players[0].Skill := 'mining';   //The skill for when you get a lamp
  Players[0].Active := True;

  Players[0].Name := 'lalalala'; // Username
  Players[0].Pass := 'dfhgh';    // Password
  Players[0].Nick := 'ala';      // 3 or 4 letters username
  Players[0].Loc := '';          // Leave as blank
  Players[0].Skill := 'mining';  // The skill for when you get a lamp
  Players[0].Active := True;
  
  WriteLn(IntToStr(HowManyPlayers) + ' Players');
end;

Procedure PowerMiners2;
Var
  x, y, prevcount, a : Integer;
begin
  PrevCount := InvCount;
  if FindObj(x, y, 'ine', RockColor, 10) then
  begin
    Mouse(x, y, 10, 5, True);
    a := 0;
    Repeat
      Wait(1000);
      a := a + 1;
      if (a = 3) then break;
    Until(InvFull)
    Loads := Loads + 1;
    Ores := Ores + 27;
  end;
end;

Procedure FFight;
Var
  b, a : integer;
begin
  if (FindFight) then
  begin
    Writeln('Found Fight');
    RunAwayDirection('N');
    Writeln('running away!');
    Wait(8000 + random(3000));
    RunBack;
  end;
  FindPick;
  FindGas(a, b);
  if (FindNewBox) then
  begin
    OpenBox;
    Wait(1000);
    GambleNewBox;
    Wait(1000);
  end;
  if (FindNewBox) then
  begin
    OpenBox;
    Wait(1000);
    GambleNewBox;
  end;
  if (FindNewBox) then
  begin
    LogOut;
    Writeln('Unable To Solve Box....Terminating');
    TerminateScript;
  end;
end;

Procedure DropOre;
begin
  MouseSpeed:= 13+Random(7);
  DropTo(2, 14);
  DropTo(15, 28);
end;

Procedure ProgressReport;
begin
  ClearDebug;
  WriteLn('Progress Report for MARTIJNTJUHS Powerminer Miner');
  WriteLn(' ');
  WriteLn('Mined and Dropped ' + IntToStr(Loads) + ' Loads.');
  WriteLn(' ');
  WriteLn('Mined and Dropped ' + IntToStr(Ores) + ' Ores.');
end;

begin
  SetupSRL;
  SetupSRLMining;
  FindPickHeadColor;
  SetRun(True);
  Repeat
    FindNormalRandoms;
    FFight;
    PowerMiners2;
    if(InvFull)then
    begin
      DropOre;
      ProgressReport;
    end;
  Until(Loads = LoadsToDo)
  WriteLn('Made by MARTIJNTJUH')
end.

item.title: Error in my progressreport....help me please
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Here you go.

//MARTIJNTJUHS powerminer!!!///
//4th script//

{.include srl\srl.scar}
{.include srl\srl\skill\mining.scar}

Const
  RockColor = 6461160;  // Color of the rock you wanna mine...
  LoadsToDo = 10000;    // Loads to mien and drop hehehe

Var
  Loads, Ores : Integer;

Procedure DeclarePlayers; //////
Begin //////
  HowManyPlayers := 2; // Set Number of Players here. //////
  NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers); // Sets the Players Array Length;/////
  CurrentPlayer := 0; // CurrentPlayer = Array Index //////
  //////
  Players[0].Name := 'scheeraap'; //Username
  Players[0].Pass := 'mafkees'; //Password
  Players[0].Nick := 'eer'; //3 or 4 letters username
  Players[0].Loc := ''; //Leave as blank
  Players[0].Skill := 'mining'; //The skill for when you get a lamp
  Players[0].Active := True; //////
  //////
  Players[0].Name := 'lalalala'; //Username
  Players[0].Pass := 'dfhgh'; //Password
  Players[0].Nick := 'ala'; //3 or 4 letters username
  Players[0].Loc := ''; //Leave as blank
  Players[0].Skill := 'mining'; //The skill for when you get a lamp
  Players[0].Active := True;
  WriteLn(inttostr(HowManyPlayers) + ' Players');
end;

procedure powerminers2;
var x,y,Loads,Ores,prevcount,a:integer;
begin
  prevcount:=invcount;
  if FindObj(x,y,'ine',RockColor,10) then
  begin
    Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
    a:=0;
    repeat
      wait(1000);
      a:=a+1;
      if a=3 then break;
    until(invfull)
    if(invfull=true)then
      Loads := loads + 1;
    Ores := Ores + 27;
  end;
end;

Procedure FFight;
var b,a:integer;
begin
  if (FindFight) then
  begin
    Writeln('Found Fight');
    RunAwayDirection('N');
    Writeln('running away!');
    Wait(8000 + random(3000));
    RunBack;
  end;
  FindPick;
  FindGas(a, b);
  if (FindNewBox) then
  begin
    OpenBox;
    Wait(1000);
    GambleNewBox;
    Wait(1000);
  end;
  if (FindNewBox) then
  begin
    OpenBox;
    wait(1000);
    GambleNewBox;
  end;
  if (FindNewBox) then
  begin
    LogOut;
    Writeln('Unable To Solve Box....Terminating');
    TerminateScript;
  end;
end;

Procedure DropOre;
begin
  MouseSpeed:= 13+random(7);
  DropTo(2, 14);
  DropTo(15, 28);
end;

Procedure ProgressReport;
begin
  WriteLn('Progress Report for MARTIJNTJUHS Powerminer Miner');
  WriteLn(' ');
  WriteLn('Mined and Dropped ' + inttostr(Loads) + ' Loads.');
  WriteLn(' ');
  WriteLn('Mined and Dropped ' + inttostr(Ores) + ' Ores.');
  writeln(' ');
  WriteLn('Made by MARTIJNTJUH')
end;

begin
  SetupSRL;
  SetupSRLMining;
  findpickheadcolor;
  setrun(true)
  repeat
    FindNormalRandoms;
    ffight;
    powerminers2;
    if(invfull)then
    begin
      DropOre;
      ProgressReport;
    end;
  until(Loads=LoadsToDo)
end.

You forgot to put in end; at the end of your progressreport procedure, and you forgot some other things.

item.dc:creator: @martijntjuh martijntjuh
item.description:
@martijntjuh wrote:

before i putted in progress report in works fine but now it doesnt :eek:

please help me thank you if you do ;D

[code]//MARTIJNTJUHS powerminer!!!///
//4th script//

{.include srl\srl.scar}
{.include srl\srl\skill\mining.scar}

const
RockColor=6461160;//color of the rock you wanna mine…
LoadsToDo=10000;///////loads to mien and drop hehehe

var Loads,Ores:Integer;

procedure DeclarePlayers; //////
begin //////
HowManyPlayers := 2; // Set Number of Players here. //////
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers); // Sets the Players Array Length;/////
CurrentPlayer := 0; // CurrentPlayer = Array Index //////
//////
Players[0].Name := ‘scheeraap’; //Username
Players[0].Pass := ‘mafkees’; //Password
Players[0].Nick := ‘eer’; //3 or 4 letters username
Players[0].Loc := ‘’; //Leave as blank
Players[0].Skill := ‘mining’; //The skill for when you get a lamp
Players[0].Active := True; //////
//////
Players[0].Name := ‘lalalala’; //Username
Players[0].Pass := ‘dfhgh’; //Password
Players[0].Nick := ‘ala’; //3 or 4 letters username
Players[0].Loc := ‘’; //Leave as blank
Players[0].Skill := ‘mining’; //The skill for when you get a lamp
Players[0].Active := True;
writeln(inttostr(HowManyPlayers) + ’ Players’);
end;

procedure powerminersssssssssssssss;
var x,y,Loads,Ores,prevcount,a:integer;
begin
prevcount:=invcount;
if FindObj(X,y,‘ine’,RockColor,10) then
begin
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
a:=0;
repeat
wait(1000);
a:=a+1;
if a=3 then break;
until(invfull)
if(invfull=true)then
Loads := loads + 1;
Ores := Ores + 27;
end;
end;

procedure FFight;
var x,y,prevcount,b,a:integer;
begin
if (FindFight) then
begin
Writeln(‘Found Fight’);
RunAwayDirection(‘N’);
Writeln(‘running away!’);
Wait(8000 + random(3000));
RunBack;
end;
FindPick;
FindGas(a, b);
if (FindNewBox) then
begin
OpenBox;
wait(1000);
GambleNewBox;
wait(1000);
end;
if (FindNewBox) then
begin
OpenBox;
wait(1000);
GambleNewBox;
end;
if (FindNewBox) then
begin
LogOut;
Writeln(‘Unable To Solve Box…Terminating’);
TerminateScript;
end;
end;

procedure DropOre;
begin
MouseSpeed:= 13+random(7);
DropTo(2, 14);
DropTo(15, 28);
end;

procedure progressreport;
begin
WriteLn(‘Progress Report for MARTIJNTJUHS Powerminer Miner’);
WriteLn(’ ‘);
WriteLn(‘Mined and Dropped ’ + inttostr(Loads) + ’ Loads.’);
WriteLn(’ ‘);
WriteLn(‘Mined and Dropped ’ + inttostr(Ores) + ’ Ores.’);
writeln(’ ');
WriteLn(‘Made by MARTIJNTJUH’)

begin
SetupSRL;
SetupSRLMining;
findpickheadcolor;
setrun(true)
repeat
FindNormalRandoms;
ffight;
powerminersssssssssssssss
if(invfull)then
DropOre;
until(Loads=LoadsToDo)
end.[/code]
